price: Na tukaufanya mchana ni wa kuchumia maisha?
footnotes: Na tumeufanya mchana ni wakati wa kuhangaika kwenu kutafuta cha kukusaidieni katika maisha yenu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
